Lua Coding.title: Help with backdooring
Lua Coding.content: Hello I was wondering if anyone has any tutorials on how I back door a gmod server so that I can take control and get super admin and stuff. I already have odium back door.lua but it only works on servers that are backdoored. I do not want to search through hundreds of servers just to find one that works I'd rather just do it myself on a small server - Thank you :)

Wordpress, Drupal, Joomla.title: Looking for wordpress plugin

It should also have some shortcode so I can include a section in the home page where every listing would appear. Do you know of a plugin that does that?)
